meanings.definition: The quality or state of being snub.
meanings.sent1: Her snubness was evident in the way she ignored everyone at the party.
meanings.sent2: I could sense the snubness in her tone when she spoke to me.
meanings.sent3: Despite his snubness, he still managed to make friends easily.
meanings.sent4: The snubness of the situation left a bitter taste in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The snubness of the rejection lingered long after the party ended.

meanings.definition: The act of snubbing someone or something.
meanings.sent1: Her snubness towards him was quite obvious to everyone present.
meanings.sent2: He felt hurt by the snubness he experienced at the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The cat showed its snubness by turning away when I tried to pet it.
meanings.sent4: The snubness of her gesture was like a slap in the face.
meanings.sent5: The snubness of the email reply was shocking and unexpected.
